[
    FullOpeningTag(
        Span {
            line: 1,
            column: 1,
            position: 0,
        },
    ),
    Expression {
        expression: ShortArray {
            start: Span {
                line: 3,
                column: 1,
                position: 7,
            },
            items: CommaSeparated {
                inner: [
                    ReferencedValue {
                        ampersand: Span {
                            line: 3,
                            column: 2,
                            position: 8,
                        },
                        value: Variable(
                            SimpleVariable(
                                SimpleVariable {
                                    span: Span {
                                        line: 3,
                                        column: 3,
                                        position: 9,
                                    },
                                    name: "$foo",
                                },
                            ),
                        ),
                    },
                ],
                commas: [],
            },
            end: Span {
                line: 3,
                column: 7,
                position: 13,
            },
        },
        ending: Semicolon(
            Span {
                line: 3,
                column: 8,
                position: 14,
            },
        ),
    },
]
